statements: UPDATE network_traffic_data SET traffic_volume = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET source_ip = '10.0.0.1', destination_ip = '192.168.1.1' WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET traffic_volume = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET destination_ip = '192.168.1.10', source_ip = '10.0.0.1' WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND traffic_volume < 5000;
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET bytes_transferred = 1500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE traffic_analysis SET speed_in_mbps = 10.5, protocol = 'TCP' WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET bytes_transferred = 1500, timestamp = '2022-01-10 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE traffic_analysis SET speed_in_mbps = 100.25, protocol = 'HTTP', analysis_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
UPDATE network_devices SET device_name = 'Switch1' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE network_traffic_records SET inbound_traffic = 500, outbound_traffic = 300 WHERE record_id = 2;
UPDATE network_devices SET device_name = 'Router2', device_type = 'Router' WHERE device_id = 101;
UPDATE network_traffic_records SET inbound_traffic = 500, outbound_traffic = 800 WHERE device_id = 101 AND TIMESTAMP = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
UPDATE network_devices SET device_name = 'Printer', device_type = 'Printer', ip_address = '192.168.1.10' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE network_traffic SET traffic_type = 'Outbound', traffic_volume = 300.50, traffic_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE traffic_id = 2;
UPDATE network_devices SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100', device_name = 'Updated Device 1' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE network_traffic SET traffic_volume = 1500.00, traffic_type = 'Updated Traffic Type' WHERE traffic_id = 3;
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET bytes_sent = 1500 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE network_devices SET location = 'Server Room B', status = FALSE WHERE device_id = '456e89b7-12d3-e89b-a456-426655440011';
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET bytes_sent = 150000 WHERE id = '9b644a6d-0a2f-4c18-8485-3a52869a794d';
UPDATE network_devices SET last_seen = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', location = 'Data Center 2' WHERE device_id = '5d6cf7a1-09c7-4cf9-a25a-9c5860dbf3c5';
